page.title: 11LOCAL POLITICS
page.content: Residents here, who have their own polling station, vote for the four main parties in a higher than average turnout at all polls. The elected Parish Council is actively concerned with conservation, the Green Belt, Public enquiries and Borough and County Planning decisions. Public meetings are held about these issues. Previously, the electorate was predominantly Tory but the Alliance vote is increasing with a changing and less traditional population. There is dissatisfaction with the Government's handling of issues such as the future of the Wisley/Ockham airfield.
